name: Love Bowling
description:
A bowling game where you have to use your skills to impress a girl

How to play

  • Click the ball and hold the mouse button
  • Move the mouse back and forth
  • At the end of the movement release the mouse button
  • The speed of the ball depends of the speed of your movement

Gameplay

  • Each pin you knock down fills the lovemeter bar, that is your progress with the girl on your side
  • If you really want to impress her you need to look for strikes and spares
  • After 10 turns your time is over and the game ends
  • There are secret endings that you can find :)

This game was made by johnperes for the Major Jam 2 with the theme "Love".

The 128x128 image used is attached in this page or can be downloaded in this link
